description: This Python module provides functions for managing environment variable mappings across different frameworks, including reading YAML templates, applying prefixes, and translating variable names.

methods.name: Path get_template_path(framework: str)
methods.description: Constructs the path to a framework-specific environment template file based on the current directory and framework name.

methods.name: Tuple[Optional[str],Dict[str,str]] parse_template_file(template_path: Path)
methods.description: Reads and parses a YAML template file to extract an optional prefix and a mapping dictionary.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] apply_prefix_mapping(common_env: Dict[str, str], prefix: str)
methods.description: Applies a specified prefix to all environment variable keys in a given dictionary.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] map_common_to_framework(framework: str, common_env: Dict[str, str])
methods.description: Maps common environment variables to framework-specific variables using a template, reverse mapping, and prefix application.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] map_framework_to_common(framework: str, framework_env: Dict[str, str])
methods.description: Converts framework-specific environment variables back to common variable names based on the template.

methods.name: list get_supported_frameworks()
methods.description: Returns a list of framework names for which environment templates are available in the directory.

ctags.name: apply_prefix_mapping
ctags.pattern: /^def apply_prefix_mapping(common_env: Dict[str, str], prefix: str) -> Dict[str, str]:$/

ctags.name: map_common_to_framework
ctags.pattern: /^def map_common_to_framework(framework: str, common_env: Dict[str, str]) -> Dict[str, str]:$/

ctags.name: map_framework_to_common
ctags.pattern: /^def map_framework_to_common(framework: str, framework_env: Dict[str, str]) -> Dict[str, str]:$/
